alert.note: Alert for Marion; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 10:56AM EST until March 10 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River from Noblesville to Hazleton. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers and their tributaries. River stages are rising again due to previous rainfall over the weekend. Minor flooding is largely expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. Moderate flooding in the Seymour area on the East Fork White River is expected to persist into Thursday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Ravenswood. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.5 feet, River Road floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 1.5 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1100 PM EST /1000 PM CST/.
